page.title: 18Home Life in Woodsetts
page.content: Most mothers go out in their cars and buy food from{Supermarkets}like Tesco and Hillards at{Worksop.}They buy food to put in their freezers instead of making it all themselves. The favourite meal is fish and chips and some people like foreign food as well such as Indian curry and Chinese food from Chinese Takeaways in{Dinnington or Worksop.All our class watch TV every night for at least one hour or more.The favourite programme is Dallas Dallas is an American programme called a soap opera,about a wealthy oil family.Almost every one has got a car. But there are still some families without one.Nearly everyone has got a {telephone.}And most people have got a {computer.}Most people have {pets. }The most popular pet is a dog.You have to have a licence to own a dog but not a cat.
